name: Hank's Couch Cruising
description:
Hank's Couch Cruising

is a runner/driving game which takes away the view of where you are going. 
Poor Hank must find its way to safety through going only backwards.

It has been uploaded as submission to Game Maker' ToolKit GameJam 2018

Created by
Kim, Insung
Nam, Taek Won
Kim, Angela Seo Kyung
